properties.name: FleetId
properties.description: A unique identifier for a fleet that the alias points to. If you specify SIMPLE for the Type property, you must specify this property.

type.description: A unique identifier for a fleet that the alias points to. If you specify SIMPLE for the Type property, you must specify this property.

properties.name: Message
properties.description: The message text to be used with a terminal routing strategy. If you specify TERMINAL for the Type property, you must specify this property.

type.description: The message text to be used with a terminal routing strategy. If you specify TERMINAL for the Type property, you must specify this property.

properties.name: Type
properties.description: Simple routing strategy. The alias resolves to one specific fleet. Use this type when routing to active fleets.

type.description: Simple routing strategy. The alias resolves to one specific fleet. Use this type when routing to active fleets.

resource.description: The AWS::GameLift::Alias resource creates an alias for an Amazon GameLift (GameLift) fleet destination.

properties.name: Description
properties.description: A human-readable description of the alias.

type.description: A human-readable description of the alias.

properties.name: Name
properties.description: A descriptive label that is associated with an alias. Alias names do not need to be unique.

type.description: A descriptive label that is associated with an alias. Alias names do not need to be unique.

properties.name: RoutingStrategy
properties.description: A routing configuration that specifies where traffic is directed for this alias, such as to a fleet or to a message.

type.description: A routing configuration that specifies where traffic is directed for this alias, such as to a fleet or to a message.

attributes.description: The AWS::GameLift::Alias resource creates an alias for an Amazon GameLift (GameLift) fleet destination.
